GULF OF GUINEA.
NIGERIA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-51.20N 006-46.08E AT
   290408Z APR. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO MDAT-GOGC,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 060521Z MAY 17.
